fields.comment: 0 = standard, 1 = bitmap level loading, loads the bitmap file
fields.name: type

fields.comment: the name that is exposed to lua functions that spawn entities
fields.name: name

fields.comment: path to the image file (texture) that is used for the background
fields.name: background_image

fields.comment: if not empty, will use this image as the left edge
fields.name: background_edge_left

fields.comment: if not empty, will use this image as the right edge
fields.name: background_edge_right

fields.comment: if not empty, will use this image as the top edge
fields.name: background_edge_top

fields.comment: if not empty, will use this image as the bottom edge
fields.name: background_edge_bottom

fields.comment: if both biomes have edges defined, will use the one with higher priority (if priority is same, will compare (>) background_images)
fields.name: background_edge_priority

fields.comment: if set will look for neighboring biomes and use their background image
fields.name: background_use_neighbor

fields.comment: height were the background image starts
fields.name: background_image_height

fields.comment: Will limit the background image to start at the cave height
fields.name: limit_background_image

fields.comment: if set, loads it to mBitmapNoise
fields.name: bitmap_noise_file

fields.comment: does the noisy edge for biomes, if either of biomes has this set to 0 will do a straight edge
fields.name: noise_biome_edges

fields.comment: if true, will leak onto other biomes and not be carveable
fields.name: big_noise_biome_edges

fields.comment: if true, will leak onto other biomes and not be carveable
fields.name: fat_biome_edges

fields.comment: skips edge texture generation. Turn of for pixel scenes
fields.name: skip_edge_textures

fields.comment: the music event that plays when player enters this biome (e.g. 'music/desert/enter')
fields.name: audio_music_enter

fields.comment: the music directory that plays while player is in this biome (e.g 'coalmine')
fields.name: audio_music_2

fields.comment: Multiplier for music energy in this biome
fields.name: audio_music_energy_coeff

fields.comment: If 1, music is not quieted by occasional quietness
fields.name: audio_music_no_forced_quietness

fields.comment: If > 0, this is the duration of occasional quietness, else the value from magic numbers is used.
fields.name: audio_music_forced_quietness_duration_seconds

fields.comment: If 1, music is triggered in this biome no matter what the danger level is
fields.name: audio_music_trigger_without_danger

fields.comment: If not 0, player Y has to be larger than this for the music to start playing
fields.name: audio_music_trigger_min_y

fields.comment: If not 0, player Y has to be smaller than this for the music to start playing
fields.name: audio_music_trigger_max_y

fields.comment: if set, this will be used to identify the biome in which this music plays, instead of Biome.name. can be used to get around some bugs with _EMPTY_ as name
fields.name: audio_biome_id_for_music

fields.comment: the ambience event that plays while player is in this biome
fields.name: audio_ambience

fields.comment: the ambience event that plays while player is in this biome and on surface
fields.name: audio_ambience_surface

fields.comment: post fx color grading
fields.name: color_grading_r

fields.comment: post fx color grading
fields.name: color_grading_g

fields.comment: post fx color grading
fields.name: color_grading_b

fields.comment: post fx color grading. [0.0,1.0], larger value means more grayscale
fields.name: color_grading_grayscale

fields.comment: if 1, rain or snowfall may occur in this biome
fields.name: has_rain

fields.comment: the way removing fog of war works in this biome
fields.name: fog_of_war_type

fields.comment: affects sky gradient. if larger than procedural value, will override it
fields.name: gradient_sky_alpha_target_mod

fields.comment: affects clouds visibility. if larger than procedural value, will override it
fields.name: rain_target_mod

fields.comment: affects fog amount. if larger than procedural value, will override it
fields.name: fog_target_mod

fields.comment: affects sunset gradient amount
fields.name: sunset_alpha_target

fields.comment: loads the chunk from this bitmap, the bitmap should be 512x512
fields.name: bitmap_filename

fields.comment: for bitmap loading, well cache it here
fields.name: bitmap_data

fields.comment: uses this file to create a herringbone wang map
fields.name: wang_template_file

fields.comment: the size of the wang map
fields.name: wang_map_width

fields.comment: the size of the wang map
fields.name: wang_map_height

fields.comment: load the bitmap noise here
fields.name: mBitmapNoise

fields.comment: default is data/scripts/biomes/NAME.lua
fields.name: lua_script

fields.comment: for 'pixel scene' biomes, this forces the loading before hand
fields.name: pixel_scene

fields.comment: for wang tiles allows color -> random color transform
fields.name: RandomMaterials

fields.comment: if 1, directly blits wang_template_file without wang randomization, kind of like a pixel scene but at the wang tile resolution
fields.name: static_tile

fields.comment: if set, and static tile is 1, the background_image will use a special shader and this mask to calculate visiblity. should be same size and resolution as 'wang_template_file'
fields.name: static_tile_bg_mask

fields.comment: threshold used in 'sprite_static_tile_bg.frag' shader in conjuction with 'sprite_static_tile_bg_mask' to determine if a background pixel is visible or not
fields.name: static_tile_bg_mask_threshold

fields.comment: 1.f = default. Will multiply the hp of the camerabounded enemies in the area with hp_scale
fields.name: game_enemy_hp_scale

fields.comment: 1.f = default. This multiplies AnimalAI's attack_ranged_frames_between in camerabounded enemies
fields.name: game_enemy_attack_speed

fields.comment: the style of the cave noise
fields.name: noise_type

fields.comment: the style of the inside noise
fields.name: mInsideNoiseType

fields.comment: will fbm the mInsideNoise if set true
fields.name: mInsideNoiseFBM

fields.comment: the noise inside the stones...
fields.name: mInsidePerlinScaleX

fields.comment: the noise inside the stones...
fields.name: mInsidePerlinScaleY

fields.comment: if set, will multiply the noise_value with the gradient value
fields.name: mInsidePerlinForceInside

fields.comment: NOTE( Petri ): 17.8.2023 - if set, will add worldseed as an offset to the noise
fields.name: mInsidePerlinOffsetBySeed

fields.comment: NOTE( Petri ): 17.8.2023 - perlin noise offset
fields.name: mInsidePerlinOffsetX

fields.comment: NOTE( Petri ): 17.8.2023 - perlin noise offset
fields.name: mInsidePerlinOffsetY

fields.comment: added inside the caves the gradient value
fields.name: mInsideAddValue

fields.comment: how much of the gradient is applied
fields.name: mMultiplierGradient

fields.comment: how much of the inside noise
fields.name: mMultiplierPerlin

fields.comment: if addNoise = 3, will use this to the ( x - mGradientSlopeStartX ) * mGradientSlopeDelta
fields.name: mGradientSlopeStartX

fields.comment: if addNoise = 3, will use this to the ( x - mGradientSlopeStartX ) * mGradientSlopeDelta
fields.name: mGradientSlopeDelta

fields.comment: fake enum 1=standard noise, 2=fbm noise, 3=slope
fields.name: mGradientAddNoise

fields.comment: if 1, is initially marked as 'terrain' in the coarse map used for sky light calculations etc
fields.name: coarse_map_force_terrain

fields.comment: if 1, is initially never marked as 'terrain' in the coarse map used for sky light calculations etc
fields.name: coarse_map_not_terrain

fields.comment: if 1, areas in this biome always have a 64x64 cell count of 0
fields.name: coarse_map_cell_count_always_zero

fields.comment: if 1, areas in this biome set the sky light propagation value to 1
fields.name: coarse_map_inject_light

fields.comment: this is set when the biome is loaded by BiomeHelper
fields.name: mBiomeMaterials

fields.comment: this should be set when the biome has modifiers. will be displayed when entering the biome
fields.name: mModifierUIDescription

fields.comment: this should be set when the biome has modifiers. UI 3-piece image to use when displaying modifier message when entering the biome
fields.name: mModifierUIDecorationFile

fields.comment: the file this was loaded from
fields.name: mDebugFilename
